name: VMware Hot Fix File
summary: File used by VMware ACE, an application used for managing groups of virtual machines; contains information that fixes a problem that an end-user has with a virtual machine instance; generated by the administrator after receiving a hot fix request ( .VMHR file) from the end-user; sent to the end-user and can be double-clicked to apply the hot fix.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
